TopicTitle: Looking for singers for a youtube parody of "What does the fox say"

Articles.Content:
I know, I want to make a parody, the problem is that I have a terrible singing voice, so if I were to sing it, it would get like 30 million downvotes and 1 upvote, so I need a singer. I will make everything (lyrics, film) all I need is a singer, it will be called "How does the Kraken work." Basically a parody about the Kraken ruining all of our amazing missions, with epic explosions of course. Comment or send me a PM if you wanna sing it!

Thanks,

arandomkerbonaut

Chances are, it would still get 30 million downvotes and 1 upvote if a good singer sang it.

Not to be an a**, but "What does the fox say?" is getting annoying, if not already extremely annoying.

The real song itself is getting old, but the only thing that this would share with the original song is the tune, and the basic idea, a question. I'm not saying your thoughts are wrong, I just couldn't think of another song that would be like that, a question that is hard to answer without the internet. It's only an idea.
